# About me

I am a Ph.D. student at the in the Department of Statistics at University of California, Santa Cruz , advised by Prof. [Zehang Li](https://zehangli.com/index.html).
I am interested in Bayesian statistics and its application to data on sociology, economics, and public health.
Currently, I am working on verbal autopsy dataset and develop statistical tools for a dynamic survey design.
